answers.answer: Hi,Numbness in hand and foot may be due to diabetes,vit vit B12 deficiency,hypothyroidism,drugs,autoimmune diseases or inherited disease.Please give  full description of symptoms including site,duration,age.Regards,

question: numbness in my right foot and right handThis discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/297181.
